It may also help doctor find diagnose ovarian epithelial cancer sooner , may easier treat . DOC.brief_title: Early Detection Ovarian Cancer : GC/FT-ICR Mass Spectrometry Canine Olfaction
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Identify pattern exhale compound breath sample patient newly diagnose ovarian epithelial cancer significantly reproducibility different healthy volunteer use gas chromatography Fourier transform ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometry ( GC/FT-ICR MS ) . - Train five canine discriminate exhale breath sample patient newly diagnose ovarian epithelial cancer healthy volunteer . - Use canine olfaction GC/FT-ICR MS distinguish exhale breath sample patient newly diagnose ovarian epithelial cancer patient polycystic ovarian syndrome endometriosis . - Repeat breath sample patient newly diagnose ovarian epithelial cancer throughout course diagnosis therapy . OUTLINE : Exhaled breath sample collect patient healthy volunteer . The sample analyze gas chromatography Fourier transform ion cyclotron resonance mass spectrometry ( GC/FT-ICR MS ) determine chemical composition , identity , predictive pattern biomarkers exhale breath condensate . GC/FT-ICR MS train canine olfaction use distinguish exhale breath sample patient ovarian epithelial cancer , patient polycystic ovarian syndrome endometriosis , healthy volunteer . Patients healthy volunteer complete questionnaire BRCA 1 BRCA 2 status ( know ) , alcohol use , smoking ( include duration type cigarette ) , physical activity ( duration type ) , socioeconomic status , education , county residence , age menopause ( applicable ) , age menarche , presence first- second-degree family history breast cancer ovarian epithelial cancer , body mass index ( height weight ) , co-morbidities .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets one follow criterion : Histologically confirm ovarian epithelial cancer Newly diagnose disease Diagnosis polycystic ovarian syndrome endometriosis Healthy volunteer meeting follow criterion : No prior ovarian cancer ( include invasive ovarian epithelial cancer , fallopian tube cancer , primary papillary serous carcinoma peritoneum ) No prior breast cancer ( include ductal carcinoma situ [ DCIS ] ) No prior ovarian breast cancer ( include DCIS ) first seconddegree relative BRCA1 BRCA2 mutation negative ( know ) OR first seconddegree relative BRCA1 BRCA2 mutation ( know ) No prior diagnosis cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Lives California close study sample center Reads write English , Spanish , Chinese Nonsmoker Willing provide breath sample No alcohol intake within past 3 day PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : At least 3 day since prior Cox2 inhibitor , vitamin E , omega3 fatty acid , antioxidant , bromelain , coenzyme Q10 , curcumin , vitamin A
